
Subject: Shutdown of your VPS

Hello %%%FIRST_NAME%%%,

Your Xen Virtual Server (VPS) %%%VPS_NUMBER%%%:%%%VPS_NODE%%%
has expired %%%EXPIRED_DAYS%%% days ago, on the: %%%EXPIRATION_DATE%%%.

We sent you some messages already to ask you to renew and you
didn't do it. We are sorry but we have to shutdown your VPS
today. Your data will be destroyed on our server so somebody else
takes the space. If you wish to restart your VPS, please renew it.

%%%SIGNATURE%%%
